articleParts.text: The help article framework is a way for users to enhance the editor application with relevant information and guidance without any changes to source code.
To get started, follow these steps:
1. Structure Your Articles: Organize your help articles into sections. Each section is represented by a folder in the 'help' directory.
2. Create JSON Files: Inside each section folder, create JSON files for each article. Use the provided JSON structure to define the content of your articles.
3. Specify Article Parts: Use the 'articleParts' array to define the parts of your article. Each part has a 'type' field indicating its type (e.g., TITLE, SEPARATOR, TEXT_BLOCK, CODE_BLOCK).
